text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 35.1. Uss Allah kay liye tamam tareefen sazawaar hain jo (ibtidaâ€™an) aasmano aur zamin ka peda kerney wala aur do do teen teen char char paron walay farsihton ko apna payghumber (qasid) bananey wala hai makhlooq mein jo chahaye ziyadti kerta hai Allah Taalaa yaqeenan her cheez per qadir hai 35.2. Allah Taalaa jo rehmat logon kay liye khol day so uss ka koi band kerney wala nahi aur jiss ko band kerday so uss kay baad iss ka koi jaari kerney wala nahi aur wohi ghalib hikmat wala hai 35.3. Logo! Tum per jo inam Allah Taalaa ney kiye hain unhen yaad kero. Kiya Allah kay siwa aur koi bhi khaliq hai jo tumhen aasman aur zamin say rozi phonchaye? Uss ka siwa koi mabood nahi. Pus tum kahan ultay jatay ho? 35.4. Aur gar yeh aap ko jhutlayen to aap say pehlay kay tamam rasool bhi jhutlaye ja chukay hain. Tamam kaam Allah hi ki taraf lotaye jatay hain
